segmentosSRT.text: And here are pins.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Xu Youqing!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text:
The teacher wants us at school
smelting steel.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: The District Head's making an inspection.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: And after the ox?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text:
What's this about pushing?
Too early for pushing!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: And what's this shouting? Out!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Go wait in the corridor.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text:
They're all reactionaries.
We've overthrown them.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Relax. Your wife's fine. We can handle this.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text:
What is he doing here?
No reactionaries allowed!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Wang Bin! Stand up!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: The working class is really something!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Wang Bin, don't make any trouble.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Don't move.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Where's the family of Xu Fengxia?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: It's a boy, 7.9 pounds.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: It doesn't matter. We're not done yet.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text:
Wait outside. When we're finished,
you can see her as much as you want.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Grandpa! It's crooked again.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Granny, your medicine.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Back already?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Has Little Bun been a good boy?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: I delivered 10 thermoses of water.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: I light the fire?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Yes, and I'll make some noodles.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Grandpa, where will the chicks live?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing eats dumplings.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia looks at photos.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Little Bun, do you know who Youqing is?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Granny, why all the photos for Fengxia?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Grandpa, where'll we put the chicks?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: When will they grow up?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: Very soon.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: And after the oxen?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: After oxen...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: After oxen, Little Bun will grow up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segmentosSRT.text: I want to ride on an ox's back!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_01
